Reforest Not found Welcome to ReforestAR! Scroll down to read all information and instructions of the application. Here you will be able to perform reforestation simulation through the use of your camera\'s device. Once the camera opens, please move your device as the on-screen animation does. This will help the camera detect surfaces to plant your trees. Once a surface is detected, it will be represent by a zone of white dots on the screen, you can plant your trees there. Keep in mind that trees must be planted with a distance of 1.5m apart each. Inside the AR camera, an options menu is available to customize your planting session, clicking the icon above toggles this menu. When inside the AR camera, you may close it by clicking on the above icon. You may also remove a tree by holding it for 1.5s. To save your projects you must have an account that can be created in the profile section or be logged in. To get started with the AR experience, just click on the button below! Pine tree
